headline: 5 Things You Need to Know If You Buy Medtronic Today
summary: Medtronic is a large medical device company with a strong history of returning value to shareholders.  It has a 3.25% dividend yield and an attractive valuation.  Medtronic is taking important steps to improve its profitability.
